title: Nuke 2.0 – Thorough file uninstaller
content: Nuke removes all the files that would otherwise be left behind when sending your old apps to the trash. With Nuke, you can also reset apps to like-new status, removing all preferences and save-data, prefect for troubleshooting an app that fails to launch. The app also provides uninstallers for software packages like Microsoft Office, Adobe […]

title: Pinstripe 1.0.3 – An emotionally charged adventure game
content: Pinstripe is an emotionally charged adventure through Hell created entirely by a one-man team over the course of five years. Play as Teddy, an estranged ex-minister forced to venture through the frozen afterlife in search of his three-year-old daughter Bo, and her perverse kidnapper. Discover the dark secrets of Teddy’s past, and confront his sleazy, […]
